website_summaries.verdict: This thermometer is as functional as it is gorgeous.
pros: More features than most competitors packed into a solid wood frame
The thermometer works well, as do the barometer and hygrometer
cons: The quartz clock can be loud
Some customers noted that theirs didn't keep time well

customer_reviews.title: good thing because the tick tock from the clock was ...
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made, gages were not fully inserted in the wood frame to be flush with the wood ... I am not sure if it is real wood ... anyway the clock hands got stuck together after a couple days and the clock stoped working ... good thing because the tick tock from the clock was verry annoying ... the hydrometer never worked ... customer service sucks
customer_reviews.author: cptnic

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: We have been watching pressure, humidity and temp since Christmas, and they adjust correctly. We have frequent changes around here and it's fun and educational to observe those. The instruction manual is actually very good, and certainly not at 3rd grader level - more like someone who at least has good basic knowledge of physics/meteorology. Looks beautiful in the living room. Don't forget to tap the barometer, and remember the lowest FLOATING bulb is the current temperature. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Too Fragile to Ship
customer_reviews.text: It was very pretty and functional, just what we were looking for! However, before we even opened the box, you could hear something 'clinking' in the box. Once we opened it, we discovered one of the globes inside the Galileo thermometer was broken - just the tip of it but it had leaked its oil into the container so it was no longer functional. The glass globes have pointed tips and float inside a glass tube. I don't know how it could be shipped and not have potential breakage. Anyway, our's was broken, and we had to return it. A shame!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT...GREAT PRICE!!!
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with this high quality product. We own a thoroughbred horse farm and it is imperative that we track the weather conditions at all times. This instrument provides instant information and serves as a unique decorative and conversation piece. So much of what you buy online is disappointing or complete crap, it is refreshing to receive an item of great quality exactly as advertised!
customer_reviews.author: THOMAS W MOSSER

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT TRUST AMAZON INSPECTORS
customer_reviews.text: Not a hit on the product. AMAZON INSPECTORS SUCK. If buying as an opened box, be leary with anything that you may buy since they do not do their job. Really considering my renewal of prime membership.
customer_reviews.author: Crayon eater

customer_reviews.title: It looked nice in the office desk
customer_reviews.text: The temperature 'bubbles' in this unit never worked. It looked nice in the office desk... but I just finally put it into the giveaway bin since Ive had it so long.
customer_reviews.author: Aloc

customer_reviews.title: Super fancy looking
customer_reviews.text: Super fancy looking; very fragile as to be expected. I've bumped it a few times with no disasters, so good enough. The clock ticks, which some (like me) get bothered by, but I still love it.
customer_reviews.author: EY

customer_reviews.title: Educational
customer_reviews.text: It’s was a gift for my niece. But once she went through the instructions and YouTube how the different gauges worked she loved it. Kind of a science geek.
customer_reviews.author: Gaylord K Manoa Jr

customer_reviews.title: couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.text: I love my weather station, It came quickly and it was just what I wanted. Very nice looking
customer_reviews.author: shock reward

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived and liquid in Galileo portion was leaking and temp disc had fallen off. Galileo portion also not working as expected if leaking. Will attempt to reorder once and reassess.
customer_reviews.author: KENDRA

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with this product
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this product. The temperature, barometer , and humidity readings are very accurate after I adjusted them at receipt. They are the most exact of any product of this type.
customer_reviews.author: Janet M  Thomason

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but overall not great quality
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty, but I wouldn't buy it for anyone else. Clock doesn't work and there's a crack on the backside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, love it, wow. Giving as a gift and wishing I could keep it.

customer_reviews.title: Great Weather Station.
customer_reviews.text: A great Weather Station. Looks great and works as stated.
customer_reviews.author: George Saba

customer_reviews.title: The weather station looks lovely, and I have received ...
customer_reviews.text: The weather station looks lovely, and I have received a number of compliments from coworkers about its appearance. However, the clock does not work properly. I have reset the time on a number of occasions, but it consistently runs slow.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift!
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift for Christmas for my boss, who wanted the thermometer combination. The Galieo thermometer was a wonderful added bonus!
customer_reviews.author: ABourbonKnitter

customer_reviews.title: It’s a beautiful piece it looks great on the server in the ...
customer_reviews.text: It’s a beautiful piece it looks great on the server in the dining room 😊

customer_reviews.title: galilieo themometer
customer_reviews.text: looks great on top of my piano and we can always depend upon it to give us the correct temp reading.
customer_reviews.author: donna d buck

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Galileo Thermometer
customer_reviews.text: This is a elegant,well made item. Fun and really nice to look at and everything works. Interesting to watch the weather change on it. Packed and shipped with no problems. Yea!!
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Quality & Beauty
customer_reviews.text: Looks even better than expected! Very happy with it. Arrived well-wrapped and works nice. Very good looking piece, made a great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi B

customer_reviews.title: Good as a decoration but thats about it
customer_reviews.text: First expressions, it looks good as a decoration but that's about it. If you want any good reading of air pressure or humidity you better go for a digital version. Also on mine clock was messed up, it was always few hours ahead a day after I set it to right time. Sent it back and ordered a digital version with an outside sensor. I am happy now.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Nephew loves it
customer_reviews.text: I gifted this to my nephew last Christmas. My sister tells me that the neighborhood kids are stopping by to check the weather. Great success!!! #miniweatherman
customer_reviews.author: eric ravnikar

customer_reviews.title: Cheap!
customer_reviews.text: It looks ok I guess, from a distance! But this thing is CHEAP! For almost $50 bucks I really expected better quality. The only decent part is the galileo thermometer, that's neat, the other dials are all cheap plastic. I can see this costing maybe $19.95 but almost $50.00?! No way! Packed it up and sent it right back.
customer_reviews.author: CAfarmgirlTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Weather Station
customer_reviews.text: My brother is the the one that I bought this for at Christmas !! He collects the Galileo thermometers and he was in love with this one to add to his collection !! Had a problem with the clock and Ambient Weather handled super fast and easy with nothing for me to do but ask !!! I highly recommend the product and the seller !!! God bless !!!
customer_reviews.author: chip0126

customer_reviews.title: Thermometer
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this on line even though I was concerned that it could get broken during shipping. However, it arrived in excellent condition. This thermometer looks much better in person than it does it the picture. It really has a classy look and I'm very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Varchol

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift, I love it. After asking for this several holidays in a row my best friend checked my Amazon wish list and got me the perfect gift.
customer_reviews.author: Cris T.

customer_reviews.title: Nice conversation piece for the home or office
customer_reviews.text: Nice conversation piece for the home or office. Only two complaints: the glass bulbs get stuck and require a gentle shake to move sometimes, and the quartz clock is really loud. To the point where I actually took the battery out.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Plotkin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Loralee Lago

customer_reviews.title: a gift for anyone who likes to know the weather changes as they are about to happen.
customer_reviews.text: my husband loves this, got it for his birthday and its used daily, Even the kids call to see if the weather is changing! Its very reliable and looks good on the side- table.
customer_reviews.author: Patzi Shea

customer_reviews.title: I like the design and I was looking to get Galileo ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the design and I was looking to get Galileo Thermometer, but it came damaged. One of the balls was broken.
customer_reviews.author: if

customer_reviews.title: great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a gift for a meteorologist and he loved it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Advice from a Caterpillar

customer_reviews.title: Not working correctly.  needs calibration
customer_reviews.text: Half of it isn't calibrated so hydrometer barometer don't work correctly. looks great if it would work right guess I'll have to find another one
customer_reviews.author: John Wrenn

customer_reviews.title: nice item
customer_reviews.text: this works great and looks nice on the shelf. I think my boss likes it. Price is good too for all it does.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nICE WEATHER  VIEW
customer_reviews.text: We are enjoying this nice piece of small furniture, we enjoy looking at it and pretty. We have it on a shelf and everyone can look at it. Lots of nice comments.
customer_reviews.author: sandra wajer

customer_reviews.title: Nice design of a weather forecaster.
customer_reviews.text: This is a Christmas gift for my 10-year-old grandson. He loves watching the weather forecast and I know he’ll love this gift. Well constructed and a nice size. Can’t tell if it works since it is a Christmas gift but the reviews were good.
customer_reviews.author: DLipari

customer_reviews.title: Broken Barometer
customer_reviews.text: This weather station is really cool looking and a great decorative piece. However, the barometer does not work. We waited to see if maybe it would move with weather changes but it is clearly broken. If it worked this would be an awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Tate

customer_reviews.title: Damaged.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one that I have received. The first one had a dead battery and the battery was all corroded in the clock. This one arrived damaged and broken fluid was leaking out of the inner box. The reason for the two stars is Amazon was very nice on the returns but I cannot receive another one. I may try to buy another one and see if it arrives in better shape.
customer_reviews.author: Chris H.

product_meta.title: Ambient Weather WS-YG709 Galileo Thermometer, Barometer, Hygrometer and Quartz Clock Weather Station (Silver)
product_meta.description:
Note: Barometer only operates to about 3.000'. Do not purchase this unit if you live at or above appx 3.000' altitude
Size:
Thermometer diameter: 1.4 in.
Instrument diameter: 2.75 in.
Overall Height: 14.5 in.
Details:
Number of glass balls: 7.
feature_bullets: This traditional weather station is both a work of art and an instrument at home in any fine study, library, office or upscale restaurant. The rich, wood framed classic weather station measures temperature (galileo), barometric pressure (in and mbar), humidity (%) with analog clock.

The Galileo thermometer consists of a sealed glass tube that is filled with liquid (paraffin oil) and several floating bubbles. The bubbles are glass spheres filled with a colored liquid mixture. Attached to each bubble is a little metal tag that indicates a temperature. These metal tags are calibrated counterweights. The weight of each tag is slightly different from the others.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars63 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
